name: Paul Elstak
description: '''Paul Roger Elstak''' (known professionally as '''DJ Paul Elstak'''; born 14 January 1966 in [[The Hague]]) is a Dutch [[hardcore techno|hardcore/gabber]] and [[happy hardcore]] [[DJ]] and record producer of [[Surinamese people|Surinamese]] descent. He used to use his full name to create happy hardcore and DJ Paul for hardcore gabber, but when he started Offensive Records in 2001, he started using both names for gabber.
